Happy Earth Day ❤️ Sometimes, when I think about the impact of our existence on her, I get overwhelmed... this happens most often when the 2nd trash bag I brought to the beach is full of plastic and trash and still there is more to pick up 🤦🏽‍♀️
 
Please, let's all do what we can to reduce our waste, reuse everything we can and recycle what must be thrown away. Deal?

Every one of these babes have had their feet sanded smooth and a wee bath to get ready for Monday's webshop restock ❤️ Every one of the steps they go through to get to you is filled with love and joy and I always hope that comes through to you when you hold my work.
 
Next webshop restock: May 1st at 7pm BST. 🧜‍♀️

I can't decide if I would flip out or enjoy watching it if my coffee mug was alive like this... 🤷🏽‍♀️ ... it's a bit trippy for me to be honest, but relaxing to watch too. All I know for sure is that my morning coffee would definitely take a lot longer to finish.
 
This mahoosive babe and a few others will be available in my webshop on May 1st at 7pm BST. And I can promise, none of them will be moving like this 😜

To prepare for Monday, here are some answers to FAQ's about the online shop ❤ 
 
Shipping: I will mail pots most anywhere, postage costs are calculated at the checkout.  Orders will be packaged up during the week the shop is open (May 1st - May 8th) and will all be away in the mail by the end of the following week at the latest. 
(For some, this 14 day period has felt like too long a time to get pots in the mail, so here is a gentle reminder that its just me making multiple trips to the post office until better options are available in my village).
 
Currency: all listings are in British Pound Sterling (£), the conversions to your currency will happen at checkout. It is helpful to research how the Pound differs to your currency beforehand to avoid disappointment 
 
Your Cart & Checkout: items in your cart aren't truly yours until you've checked out so things in your cart may become unavailable as you shop. If you're very keen to have a certain pot, check it out first then shop, all postage overages will be refunded to the payment method you used at checkout after your pots are in the mail.
🌞

 
 
 
 
 
 

#coastaldecor #wheretoseebuyceramicsuk #slabbuiltceramics #claystagram #ihavethisthingwithceramics #coastalstyle #scottishceramics #ukartist #scottishpotters #oceanlove #takemetothesea #wildswimminguk #mermaidvibes  #potterylife #functionalceramics #ukhandmade #madeinscotland #imadethis #handbuiltpottery #ceramiclicious #claylove #slowmadegoods #kilnfolk

Tools down 🌊 In the midst of getting ready for tomorrow's webshop update I am also getting ready to move. My beloved studio and cottage went on the market this week so I am packing and I tell you, it is bittersweet, to say the least.
 
You know what this studio space means to me and to Studio Manager🐾... (I haven't had the nerve to tell him we are leaving it yet)... 
 
I am not 100% sure what the next steps are, but it is time for a change even if it brings some pain with it. I have learned over the last 11 months that pain does not mean the wrong decision has been made... change almost always brings pain points with it. Pain is part of the process, we feel it and grow through it, right? 
 
All of this is to say that it may be another wee while before the next webshop update but fear not, this clay addict WILL be making pots again and will keep you in the loop as Studio Manager and I navigate this next chapter. 
🐾❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#backyardstudio #studiopottery #madeinscotland #selfcarematters #scottishcraft #onwardsandupwards #scottishceramics #ceramiclife #pottery_lovers #eastlothianlife #scottishpotters

You know how people often say things like "Saying thank you just doesn't feel like enough to convey my gratitude" and it feels a bit like false modesty or some other kind of bullshite?? 

Well, after your incredible response to my webshop update yesterday, I can attest to the deep, deep, DEEP truth of that statement. 

After having to cancel the last 2 restocks due to life events, I truly did not know what to expect yesterday. I hoped for a good turn out but after letting you down twice I just wasn't sure to expect. 

The shop sold out in less than half an hour, 28 minutes to be exact... the fact that you were there with me when the shop opened has broken my heart wide open in the best way possible and I will say it anyway, even though it feels too small...  

Thank you.
Truly, from the very deep depths of my heart, thank you.  

Thank you for your comments and shares and purchases and messages of support. It sounds SO cheesy, but I really do appreciate all of you, deeply... this pottery space just doesn't work without you. Thank you for being here with me. 

❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 

 
#coastalstyle #mermaidlife #gratefulaf #oceaninspired  #scottishceramics #studiopottery #kilnfolk #lovemymakers #ukhandmade #madeinscotland

This part always makes me happy ❤️ Each pot gets wrapped up tightly and packed within an inch of it's life in double-walled boxes so they make it safely home. 
 
I always imagine them living happily ever after, being of service and bringing their oceany, mermaid vibes to their new homes 🌞 
 
This personification of inanimate objects and life-story telling probably means I am a little too nuts for my own work, but I am okay with that. 
 
Also, "Please handle me with care" should be part of a life lesson plan we get at birth... amiright?? 
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
#scottishceramics #oceanminded
#wildswimminguk
#oceanlover
#takemetothesea
#sealover
#ceramiclife
#oceanholiclife
#pottery_lovers #studiopottery

You know how it makes total sense to put down all the bazillion things on your plate and leave the country for a few days? 😜🤦🏽‍♀️🙃 I learned this weekend that, contrary to what I thought, it really does make sense!
 
I didn't realize how badly I needed a wee break, a change of scenery, time away from the to-do lists to laugh and explore and EAT! 
 
I highly recommend vacationing... vacating... for a few days, it doesn't have to be a long time, just long enough to be able to breathe deeply and drop your shoulders again. 
 
Go for it.
You deserve the joy.
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#gratefulaf #selfcarematters #travelmore #takecareofyourself #selfcaredaily #kraków

Take 30 seconds with me to take care of yourself ❤️ Breathe deeply in. Let it alllllll out. Drop your shoulders. Unclench your jaw. Sink into your body and breathe...

Repeat.
Often.
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#selfcarematters #stabbshead #scottishborders #oceanholic #takemetothesea #oceaninspired #selfcaredaily

Tell me you are an oceanholic without saying you're an oceanholic 😉 I have started packing up my home & studio... the excitement for my next adventure is making patience harder to grasp some days 🤦🏽‍♀️ 
 
All going well, Studio Manager and I will be settled again by my birthday in July and I can't think of a better way to start my 46th year 🧜‍♀️🐾 My, oh, my, how things can change in a year! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
#oceanholic  #mermaidlife #sealovers #takemetothesea #scottishmaker #selfcarematters #lifeofapotter

Happy Monday to you ❤️ Do something wonderful for yourself today, you deserve it. 
 
This babe came back home with me from a memorial show at Bridge Pottery earlier this month 🧜‍♀️ She is a new design and went out the door quickly after the glaze firing so it has been nice to have this time with her. 
 
What would you call this design? I have a few ideas but am not landing hard on any just yet... what does she inspire in you? 
🤷🏽‍♀️

The summer solstice is here 🌞 a good time to get outside and breathe deeply... to drop your shoulders away from your ears... to unclench your jaw and find some peace within yourself to carry with you into the second half of the year. 
 
You are loved.
You can do anything you set your mind to.
You are incredibly powerful.
Protect your peace.
 
Happy summer.
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
#oceanholic #seainspired #natureheals #summersolstice #selfcarematters #takemetothesea

🐾Studio Manager and I are soaking up every minute we can in the back garden and the studio before the move (we have 3.5 weeks to go). 
 
This little building, surrounded by plants and trees, will be a life-long memory of what a true "happy place" feels like ❤️ I am excited to create a new happy place, but this one will be deeply missed and never forgotten.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#oceanminded
#backyardstudio #myfamiliar #wildswimminguk

I realized this morning that this wee bud babe is the very last of the pots made in my wee east lothian studio 😳 This realization whopped me upside the head a bit... despite all the boxes everywhere and all my tools packed safely away for a month now, this was a surprise. 
 
This wee babe represents the end of a chapter and the start of a new one... both excitement and grief in a single moment, in a single pot ❤️ 
 
If you would like a better look at her, visit the "Wild Places" collection at @charliecummingsgallery She is still available there and ready for whomever wishes to bring her home. 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
#wildswimming #oceaninspired #takemetothesea #coastalliving #slabbuiltceramics #madeinscotland  #studiopottery #flowerarranging

Sending love 🐾❤️ We are still here, enjoying every moment we can catch in this space while we prepare to move to a new one. 
 
12 more days, eeeeeee! 
🌞
 
Excited doesn't really cover the entirety of the feelings lately... a mixed bag of emotions seems to be more accurate with excitement being the one taking up the most room in the bag. 
 
I will miss so much about this studio and East Lothian and am also so, very excited to see what this new chapter on the West coast brings. 
 
At any rate, we are still here.
I am still here.
Still sending love.
Still so deeply grateful for all of you who are here with me on this great clay adventure.
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#oceanminded
#wildswimminguk
#gratefulaf #oceanlover
#takemetothesea
#coastalstyle
#ohidolovetobebesidetheseaside
#oceanholiclife 
#pottery_lovers #potterytechniques

A collector sent this photo of her Mermaid Vase in use and I wanted to share it with you 🧜‍♀️ I am so looking forward to making more of these when the new studio is set up! 

7 days until we move, weeeeeeeee! 🌞
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
#scottishmaker #mermaidlife #oceaninspired #wildswimming #wildswimminguk #sealovers #ohidolovetobebesidetheseaside

This is 46 🌞 It has been a beautiful birthday, full of love and food and laughing and tears and then laughing about the tears... anyone else cry when really happy things happen?  Happy tears are a real thing, right?  #askingforafriend 😉
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
#happybirthdaytome #eastlothianmaker #mainer #oceanholic #gratefulaf

If you have been with me here for a while, you will know that Studio Manager and I moved across the country a week ago 🐾🧜‍♀️ It has been a whirlwind week, no exaggerations there, but we are settling in and my excitement to make pots again is growing as the electrics get installed in the new studio 💃
 
All going well, mugs and other pots will start taking shape again by late August 🤞🏻🤞🏻🤞🏻 And to be honest, excitement doesn't quite cover the feeling I am having as as the new studio starts to become real... it is a mix of emotions, identity is mixed in there too, you know what I mean? 
 
Anyway, have a lovely weekend. 
As always, Studio Manager and I are sending love ❤️🌞🐾 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#oceaninspired #wildswimminguk #scottishmaker #takemetothesea #madeinscotland #scottishpotters #slowmade #coffeemugoftheday

We are still here 🐾❤️👋🏻 and things are happening!  The studio electrics are finished, Betty (the kiln) is wired in, and now I am painting and vacuuming and working out a plan for using the natural light to its best advantage. 
 
There is a lot more to do in here than I thought, but it is all doable and figureoutable 🌞 
 
This space is about 3 times larger than my last one and to be honest, I'm not quite sure what to do with it all. I am trusting that the answers will come the more I am down here... and accepting that it will probably take 2 or 3 arrangements to find the right one. 
 
It is going to be great and I am so excited to start making pots again. Soon!
💃💃
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
#potterystudio #potterslife #scottishpotters #scottishmaker #studiopottery #gratefulaf

Studio Update! 💃 4 layers of paint... 3 full shop vac bags of dirt and schmootz... 6 car loads of crap to the recycling center... umpteen hours of manual labor... many surprises (mostly bugs) and 4 strands of industrial strength twinkle lights 🌞 
 
I will have my hands in clay on Monday.  Wooohoooo! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#scottishpotters
#pottersofinstagram 
#gratefulaf #scottishceramics

Today is the first day I have had my hands in clay since the house/studio move process started on May... it feels like a core piece of myself is chinking back into place, it is very comforting 🧜‍♀️ 
 
Fun fact:  my "Avesha's Studio. Masterpieces while you wait." sign was gifted to me nearly 20 years ago by a very wonderful friend  Lori who runs @ljpceramicart ❤️ We got our BFA's in Ceramics together at @mecaart back in the day when the internet and cell phones were still new 😉
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#scottishpotters #pottersofinstagram #ukartist #scottishceramics #makersgottamake #handmadeuk #studiopottery #scottishmaker #ukhandmade #potterslife #slabbuiltceramics

The 1st pot made in my new workspace 🤩 You betchya I am keeping this one. 
 
This wee babe represents more than I can put into words... more than words can express actually and those of you who have been wirh me over the last 16 months know why. 
 
So, fingers, toes and eyes crossed that she makes it through all the steps in the process and I can sit with her in the mornings with coffee and peace. 
🤞🏻❤️
 
Until then, chin up, tits out, forward march 💃
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
#slabbuiltceramics #slowmade #ukhandmade #scottishpotters #madeinscotland #makersofinstagram #pottergram #pottersofinstagram #redclaylove #makersgottamake

A momemt. A deep breath. Joy in clay form 🌞 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
#ihavethisthingwithceramics #slabbuiltceramics #redclaylove #makersgottamake #slowmadegoods #scottishceramics #madeinscotland #oceanlover #seainspired

Sunday slab meditations are back! 💃 (but with no promises for a new slab every sunday, ok?)
 
If you have been with me here for a while you will know what this slab signifies, there is a whole lot of symbolism lying within these beautiful, muddy particles...
 
Strength.
Perseverence.
Faith.
Being down on my knees and getting back up again.
Leaps of faith... so. many. leaps!
Asking for help.
Accepting help.
Patience.
Ruthless self-care.
 
So much is out of our control (no surprise there), all we can do is strive to do our best in every moment, do better next time if we mess up and be gentle, oh, so gentle, with our wee hearts as we go through unforseen things and build the skills we need to navigate them. 
 
And in the midst of that, probably most importantly, stay true to the parts of us that bring deep happiness... cellular joy... those things are why we are here.
 
For me, it was keeping this slab in my vision, even when it felt lightyears away. This heap of mud is why I am here and to be able to smooth a slab again brings me inexplicable joy. 
 
I am still here.
I am stronger than I ever knew I could be.
And so are you.
Don't forget it.
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 

#sundayslabmeditations #slabbuiltceramics #selfcaredaily #gratefulaf #selfcarematters #scottishmaker #scottishpotters #slowmade #forthejoyofit #madeinscotland #ukhandmade #makersgottamake

You guys ask for the best stuff 🌞  Now that the studio is up and running again I am making potential plans for offering my email community the option of mug pre-orders.... I want to get a sense though about interest in that idea so I ask, would you be interested in pre-ordering a mug? 
 
FYI, there is no expectauon of follow through here, a more official opportunity to order will come if the interest is there, but for now, let me know if you are interested in the comments 👇🏽 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#gratefulaf #slabbuiltceramics #ceramiclife #ihavethisthingwithceramics #slowmade #makersgottamake #madeinscotland #pottersofinstagram #scottishpottery #ukhandmade #slowmadegoods #fuckthis #redclaylove #scottishceramics #scottishmaker #makermovement #pottery_lovers

You know it's been a while when your glaze looks more like cheesecake than liquid........ 😳
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#pottery_lovers #ceramiclicious #ihavethisthingwithceramics #studiopottery #scottishcraft #ukhandmade #asmrclay #makersgottamake

Weeeeeeee! 💃 The first glaze firing in my new studio was a huge success.... gah, now I can breathe deeply again and plan. Yaaayyyyy! 
 
Also, this kilnload (even before opening the kiln) has had me in a reflective mood, thinking back to what has happened to get here, all of the things since May 2022... so many lists and so much paperwork! 
 
Even if it fired terribly, I had decided that this kilnload is a celebration 🌞 A celebration of determination, blind leaps of faith, accepting help, and trusting in things I cannot see. It is a celebration of what can be done when no way and no how is visible at the moment. 

I am over the moon with this firing and you can bet your sweet booty I keeping a mug for myself!
❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#potter #sealover #wildswimming #oceanlover #ihavethisthingwithceramics #ceramiclicious #luckybroad #ukhandmade #slabbuiltceramics #madeinscotland

Steps in the process... and shrinkage is real, yo! ❤️ As the water molecules in the clay dry out or are fired out in the kiln, the other ingredients fill in the spaces and the pot gets smaller. 
 
Knowing this "shrinkage rate" for your clay is helpful for making sure your finished pot is the size you want it to be 😉
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 

#slabbuiltceramics #ihavethisthingwithceramics #oceanminded #pottersofinstagram #makersgottamake #ukhandmade #madeinscotland #slowmadegoods #sealover #wildswimmer #oceanlover #scottishpotters #ceramiclicious

You know that saying "what doesn't kill you makes you stronger"? 🙄😳🤢 This was Saturday... while the flooding in our area was MUCH less than others, it is still a total pain in the arse.
 
The water is 99.9% gone from the studio this morning and Betty (the kiln) wasn't damaged. Today, I am grateful for good drainage and dehumidifiers 😍 What are you grateful for? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#potterylife #studiopottery #gratefulaf #studioceramics #itsjustwater

In some incredibly impeccable timing, two of my very most favorite people on the planet are visiting ❤️❤️ Studio updates will pause just now while my parental units are in toon. See you in a week or so ❤️❤️
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#potter #sealover #inveraraycastle #oceanlover #ceramiclicious #luckybroad #ukhandmade #slabbuiltceramics #madeinscotland #gratefulaf

I have been able to catch some making moments while my parental units are visiting ❤️ It feels so good in this studio, I don't have words for it really, but I know in my gut there is a lot of happiness coming in here 🌞 
 
Ps: my next shop update is coming on Nov 10th at 6pm (UK time) 😉
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#slabpottery #ihavethisthingwithceramics #slabbuiltceramics #claylove #oceanminded #wildswimming #takemetothesea #makersgottamake #madeinscotland #slowmade

My parental units flew home to Maine this morning and I am trying hard not to be devastated... love is beautiful and hard sometimes, you know? 
 
Keeping busy helps, lots of laundry and getting organized for a mug-making marathon has helped me feel productive and has left room for tears too. 
 
I opened a small amount of mug pre-orders up to my email community last week and am excited to say they sold out so these next few days will be all about mugs! 
 
I will also be making some one-off pots (and more mugs, of course) for a small webshop restock on November 10th at 6pm UK time. If you want details of all the pots of offer ahead of time and early access to the shop on the day, join my email list. The link is in my bio 👆❤️
 
Okay, that's enough for now... I need to go finish the laundry 😬
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
#slowmade #madeinscotland #oceaninspired #ihavethisthingwithceramics #makersgottamake #oceanlover #slabpottery #ukhandmade #potteryvideos

#sundayslabmeditations ❤️ I hope this provides a moment of calm for you today.  In all of everything that is going on in the world just now, take care of your heart and nervous system, take care of you. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#pottery_lovers #ihavethisthingwithceramics #potteryvideos #ceramiclicious #ukhandmade #madeinscotland #slowmadegoods #slabpottery #slab

You know what's kind of neat and also intensely frustrating?  No matter how long I work with this material it reminds me daily that I am not in charge... 🤦🏽‍♀️ If I push it too far, it reminds me. If I try to move more quickly than it wants, it reminds me. If I don't wait for it, it reminds me. 
 
Clay is the boss. 
Always.
Every day.
All day long. 
 
Which is why it feels so good when a pot comes through the process. I know it is a gift, but it also feels like a major win 🌞 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 

#makers #ukhandmade #slabpottery #oceaninspired #makersgottamake #ceramiclife #studiopottery

2 more days, woot! 🧜‍♀️ This collection of pots is the first made in my new studio and it feels especially special somehow. I am extra excited to see where these oceany babes will get to live :) 
 
In case you are wondering, the cheeky mugs came on the back of the studio flood at the start of October... quite literally, constant repetition of "fuck, fuckity, fuck" and "fuck this shit" kept me sane over the few days afterward while I dealt with the damage and waited for the water to drain away. 
 
Some days, you just need something stronger than "darn it"... you know? 
 
Anyway, see you in the webshop on Friday at 7pm GMT 🧜‍♀️🌊 The link will be in my bio at 6:59pm :)

December Pre-orders Open Sunday @ 1PM GMT 💃 The October pre-order experiment provided a LOT of learning opportunities and to be honest I've have gone back and forth about doing this again. BUT the response has been so positive that I will try this again once more with MUCH better communication and more realistic expectations of myself and the studio.

Here is all of the information you will need to consider before the 10th of December when the next (and probably final) mug pre-order opportunity goes live.
 
🌊  The shop will open again with all of your favorite mugs (and footed cups this time too!) to pre-order on December 10th at 1pm GMT. There will be 10 of each design. 
 
🌊 These mugs & cups will be MADE TO ORDER.  Because these pots are going to be made specifically for you and this process takes a lot of time, please allow 6-8 weeks before expecting an email update on your order. 
 
🌊 My glaze is fluid and variable, specific requests for the glaze are impossible. The only guarantee I can make about it is that it will bring ALL of the depths of the sea to you and will be one of a kind.
 
🌊 Unlike shop restocks these pots are not waiting in the studio to be mailed out on the day you order. Please consider and remember this detail for your planning.
 
So, if you are keen to have a mug or cup made just for you and happy to wait, join me in the webshop on Sunday at 1pm GMT 💃

It's weird, this time of year usually has me slowing down, hibernating and reflecting... but this year I have energy and motivation, so I am just going with it . Going with the new flow. 🌞  If the last 18 months have taught me anything, the fact that life can turn on a dime and look completely different (and SO much better) has been etched into my core. 
 
We just never know, you know? Let's not take anything for granted... routines, habits, people... nothing is ever certain, deeply enjoy what you can and let the rest go.
 
Most of all, listen to yourself, above all else, listen to your gut and let her lead.  You will be okay, I promise.
❤️

Okay, so this may not be a popular opinion, but after seeing too many examples I just gotta say...  (folks in Ceramics 101, this is for you)... please do not comment your "just thought you should know" suggestions to established potters. Be humble.

This isn't to say established potters can't still learn things, but they have navigated the early waters YEARS ago and know what they are doing. 

What you are doing when you leave these suggestions is incredibly disrespectful to this knowledge and expertise. Be humble. 

We all understand your excitement and intensity about clay at this stage in your journey with it, we have alllllll been there. However, what you are doing is discounting the hundreds (likely thousands) of hours the potter has spent with their clay body. They know more about it than you do.  Be humble. 

We are taught at the start of our clay journeys some black and white stuff about clay that over time we learn is actually very gray. We are taught this at the start to avoid disasters in the very expensive kilns at school/uni/college but you will learn over the years working with this medium that not much is black and white, each clay body is unique (as are the glazes we use) they all require different ways of working/firing and have their own "give and take" depending on how the potter works.  Be humble. 

Your excitement is lovely. Your "helpful suggestions" are not. 

Be humble. Respect the knowledge the potter has and learn from them or just scroll on. 
Okay? 
Ok.
👍🏼
 
(Ps: i can't get enough of this Closer to Fine cover, seriously, its been on repeat for DAYS! Thank you @brandicarlile ❤️)
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#potterylove #oceanminded #behumble #slabbuiltceramics #makersgottamake #potterslife #makersgonnamake #pottersofinstagram #potterytechniques #ceramiclife #claylove

I go on about the sea so often that I forget how frigging magical and healing the mountains are... especially the Scottish Highlands ❤️ Photos don't ever really capture the breathtakingness of the Highlands, but they are a glimmer. 
 
I spent Christmas and Boxing Day up North on trails, breathing it all in and trying not to cry too much 😂 (this landscape always brings goosebumps and tears, always). The Highlands have a way of reminding me just how small we are in the scheme of things, a blip on an unimaginably long continuum, but I leave them feeling restored rather than defeated. 
 
I think the Highlands and the ocean are my church, they reconnect me to something bigger and refill me ❤️ I am forever grateful that I am able to adventure like this, I have a body that can move (most days 😉) and a reliable car, money for fuel and the ability to cook road trip snacks and plan out a trip. This priviledge is not lost on me, I am a lucky broad. 
💃
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

#scottishhighlands #luckybroad #gratefulheart #getoutsidemore #selfcarematters #scotlandexplore #natureseekers

I don't know... this time of year has never felt like a new start, Spring has always felt more like the start of a new year to me. Who decided January was the start of the year? 🤷🏽‍♀️ Why not April? 
 
Regardless of any of that... thank you for being here. Thank you for sticking with me. Thank you for your support, in all of its forms. Thank you for checking in on me when I went quiet here (that hot minute was so full of life admin that I didn't have the brain space to be present here). Thank you for knowing I would be back ❤️
 
And, I am back, yo! 💃
 
Somehow, I have landed well and truly on my feet in a place I love. How frigging lucky am I? 
 
Don't get me wrong, I worked my ass off to get here (literally and figuratively), but the people around me, the ones scaffolding me as I made giant decisions with little information... decisions only I could make... kept me standing and I am so deeply grateful. 
 
So, if tomorrow IS the new year I will be walking into it with clay under my nails, a happy soul and a very, very grateful heart. ❤️ 
 
What will you be walking into 2024 with? 
🌞

The internal workings of a human's arm are just so cool... this was the thought going through my head as I was glazing this morning 🙃 But seriously, how cool is it that all of those tendons, bones and muscles can turn a pot 360° at a very specific angle and pace in order to cover the whole inside of the pot in one go? 

How many different pulleys and levers are working together inside there to make this happen?  

Not to mention the brain sending all the messages...! 🤯

When you think about it, our bodies (and all they do on the daily without us even thinking about it) are really frigging amazing. 

You know what I mean?
❤️
 
Ps: don't mind my face... I really am happy 😂 RBF is real, yo!

Did you know that every pot I make gets at least 1 little heart on the bottom? ❤️ This started many years ago as a way to literally show how much love is put into each pot and also to be a little surprise for those of us always doing the dishes... showing a little love for the dishpan hands that keep us all fed and watered and not living in filth. 
 
Show the love.
Let them know you appreciate all they do.
Make it weird if you have to.
Life is so short, let them know you love them.
❤️
